p.hi: went away after breakfast. I paid the household bills, which show a disconcerting increase.
lunched here. He wanted to discuss with me the new scheme for Sherburn Hospital.

and I walked for an hour in a fair sunshine which was a hypocritical masque of a bitter wind. The choirboys came and sang carols in the drawing room for an hour. We asked the residents in the College, and a few others to come in. I gave the boys severally sixpence, and Ella added an orange, and a Christmas card.
